attributes.action: Inform every pregnant Lady about Group B Strep
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are so many Woman out there unaware of the dangers of Group B Strep. It's the Children that suffer and it's time for a change. 
If Leaflets were given at least then it is down to the individual to then either test or leave it.


Group B Streptococcus is the most common cause of life-threatening infections in newborn babies in the UK. Without preventative medicine, Group B strep infects around 700 babies each year out of these sadly 75 or so die and around 40 survivors suffer long-term problems as a result.

Every woman should be made aware of this!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
